nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 74. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
